nodes.text: Ultimate Factivity Collection: Star Wars Rebels
Ultimate Factivity Collection: Star Wars Rebels is a children's activity book from the Star Wars Rebels series written by David Fentiman, Ruth Amos and Lisa Stock. It was released on April 7, 2015.

A fact-packed activity book filled with galactic adventure! DK's Ultimate Factivity Collection: Star Wars Rebels combines exciting facts about all of the characters from the brand-new animated series, Star Wars Rebels, with fun activities and over 500 full-color stickers. Learn all about the new series, set between the events of Star Wars: Episodes III and IV, through games, sticker activities and puzzles. Engaging reference material guides the child through each activity, while the fun challenges and puzzles inspire creativity in Ultimate Factivity Collection: Star Wars Rebels.
